firstSideCard.heading: JOIN US ON THE ICE
firstSideCard.text1: It's a strange winter for us. We want to be out on the ice with our fantastic guests. We have therefore created a Cornona-adapted skating package where transport and accommodation are not included (as it use to be). For you who are already in Sweden, and who longing for fantastic Nordic skating. Read more here.
firstSideCard.text2: Do not worry about tomorrow; it will have enough worries of its own. There is no need to add to the troubles each day brings. Matt 6:34
